headings.usage: Main titles, card headers, big metrics

mono.usage: Stock prices, percentages, tabular data, timestamps

structure.description: Top bar with logo and refresh button. Minimal height.
Large card displaying current SPX price. Dominant visual. Uses 'glow' gradient background.
Wide card spanning 2-3 columns. Interactive historical chart.
Grid of smaller square cards for Open, High, Low, Volume. Dense information.

cards.classes: bg-zinc-900/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-zinc-200 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.icon: p-2 rounded-full hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors text-zinc-400 hover:text-white

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines or make them very subtle (#333). Use gradient fills for area charts. Tooltips must be custom styled (dark bg, white text).

motion.price_update: Flash green/red background on price change (use framer-motion AnimatePresence)

visual_enhancers.noise: Add a fixed position div with a noise texture opacity-5 pointer-events-none z-50 mix-blend-overlay
visual_enhancers.glows: Use absolute positioned divs with blur-3xl behind key elements to create atmospheric lighting

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #fafafa on dark backgrounds. Use #a1a1aa for secondary text, never darker.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Outfit' font for all headings and 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial data.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout strictly. Do not just stack divs.
The 'Ticker Card' should feel like the heartbeat of the app. Make the price HUGE (text-6xl+).
Use 'Recharts' for the chart. Customize the X/Y axis to be minimal. No heavy grid lines.
Ensure the 'Refresh' button has a satisfying loading state (spin animation).
Do not use default Shadcn card styles. Override them with the 'Glassmorphism' styles defined in 'components.cards'.
Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the entire app for that 'film grain' premium feel.
Mock the Yahoo Finance API call if real data is not accessible, but structure the data exactly as the API would return it.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text everywhere.
Dark Mode Only: This is a financial tool. Light mode is not an option for this MVP.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click. Hover states should be obvious.
Data-Test-IDs: Add 'data-testid' to the Price Display, Refresh Button, and Chart Container.
